name: CLLocation
desc: The latitude, longitude, and course information reported by the system.

items.name: init(latitude: CLLocationDegrees, longitude: CLLocationDegrees)
items.desc: Creates a location object with the specified latitude and longitude.

items.name: init(coordinate: CLLocationCoordinate2D, altitude: CLLocationDistance, horizontalAccuracy: CLLocationAccuracy, verticalAccuracy: CLLocationAccuracy, timestamp: Date)
items.desc: Creates a location object with the specified coordinate and altitude information.

items.name: init(coordinate: CLLocationCoordinate2D, altitude: CLLocationDistance, horizontalAccuracy: CLLocationAccuracy, verticalAccuracy: CLLocationAccuracy, course: CLLocationDirection, speed: CLLocationSpeed, timestamp: Date)
items.desc: Creates a location object with the specified coordinate, altitude, and course information.

items.name: init(coordinate: CLLocationCoordinate2D, altitude: CLLocationDistance, horizontalAccuracy: CLLocationAccuracy, verticalAccuracy: CLLocationAccuracy, course: CLLocationDirection, courseAccuracy: CLLocationDirectionAccuracy, speed: CLLocationSpeed, speedAccuracy: CLLocationSpeedAccuracy, timestamp: Date)
items.desc: Creates a location object with the specified coordinate, altitude, course, and accuracy information.

items.name: init(coordinate: CLLocationCoordinate2D, altitude: CLLocationDistance, horizontalAccuracy: CLLocationAccuracy, verticalAccuracy: CLLocationAccuracy, course: CLLocationDirection, courseAccuracy: CLLocationDirectionAccuracy, speed: CLLocationSpeed, speedAccuracy: CLLocationSpeedAccuracy, timestamp: Date, sourceInfo: CLLocationSourceInformation)
var coordinate: CLLocationCoordinate2D
items.desc: The geographical coordinate information.

items.name: var altitude: CLLocationDistance
items.desc: The altitude above mean sea level associated with a location, measured in meters.

items.name: var ellipsoidalAltitude: CLLocationDistance
items.desc: The altitude as a height above the World Geodetic System 1984 (WGS84) ellipsoid, measured in meters.

items.name: var floor: CLFloor?
items.desc: The logical floor of the building in which the user is located.

items.name: var horizontalAccuracy: CLLocationAccuracy
items.desc: The radius of uncertainty for the location, measured in meters.

items.name: var verticalAccuracy: CLLocationAccuracy
items.desc: The validity of the altitude values, and their estimated uncertainty, measured in meters.

items.name: var timestamp: Date
items.desc: The time at which this location was determined.

items.name: var sourceInformation: CLLocationSourceInformation?
items.desc: Information about the source that provides the location.

items.name: func distance(from: CLLocation) -> CLLocationDistance
items.desc: Returns the distance (measured in meters) from the current objectâ€™s location to the specified location.

items.name: var speed: CLLocationSpeed
items.desc: The instantaneous speed of the device, measured in meters per second.

items.name: var speedAccuracy: CLLocationSpeedAccuracy
items.desc: The accuracy of the speed value, measured in meters per second.

items.name: var course: CLLocationDirection
items.desc: The direction in which the device is traveling, measured in degrees and relative to due north.

items.name: var courseAccuracy: CLLocationDirectionAccuracy
items.desc: The accuracy of the course value, measured in degrees.

items.name: typealias CLLocationSpeed
items.desc: The velocity (measured in meters per second) at which the device is moving.

items.name: typealias CLLocationDirection
items.desc: An azimuth that is measured in degrees relative to true north.

items.name: typealias CLLocationDistance
items.desc: A distance measurement (measured in meters) from an existing location.

items.name: typealias CLLocationAccuracy
items.desc: The accuracy of a geographical coordinate.

items.name: typealias CLLocationSpeedAccuracy
items.desc: The accuracy of a speed.

items.name: typealias CLLocationDirectionAccuracy
items.desc: The accuracy of a compass heading.
